abstract: Hedge fund billionaire Julian H Robertson donates $25 million to charter school network Success Academy; organization says gift will help it expand to 100 schools, from 34, over 10 years.

headline.print_headline: Success Academy Receives a Record $25 Million Gift
headline.main: Success Academy Charter School Network Receives $25 Million Gift

snippet: The organization said it had received the gift from the hedge fund billionaire Julian H. Robertson and would use the money to expand to 100 schools.
lead_paragraph: The organization said it had received the gift from the hedge fund billionaire Julian H. Robertson and would use the money to expand to 100 schools.
